segments.text: I can hardly make ends meet these days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Same here . I have't brought any new clothes for three months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My income remains the same but prices just continue to rise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: True . The news says that there is a general increase in the price of daily necessities .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Definitely . I have to spend 300 yuan more on food every month .
segments.speaker: S2
